source:
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Mogek points to Hildeth in the plaza.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_00 Schwierigkeitsanpassung
Mogek Schlaubommel hat eine Nachricht von einer Ritterin für dich.

source:
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_01Mogek was attempting to steer you towards Hildeth, who has requested your presence. Speak to the Temple Knight to see what she wants.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_01 Die Schwierigkeit des Auftrags wird an die aktuelle Stufe angepasst.

Die Ritterin Hildeth hat nach dir gefragt. Es gibt etwas, bei dem sie deine Hilfe braucht, aber was das ist, wollte sie Mogek nicht verraten. Finde sie auf dem Bahrr Lehs und frag sie.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_02<tab>Speaking in a hushed voice, Hildeth tells you that the Temple Knight sappers wish to repay the moogles for their hospitality by introducing them to Ishgardian stew. Upon the initial count of supplies, they noticed there were a couple of elements that had been forgotten in the order sent to Ishgard, and entrusts to your craftsmanship skills to make before the ingredients spoil. Go to Asah to request materials from Mogwon without giving away the surprise.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_02<tab>Hildeth möchte sich bei den Mogrys mit einem leckeren Essen bedanken. Sie braucht dabei deine Hilfe: Geh zuerst zu Mogwon und lass dir die richtigen Zutaten geben.

source:
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_03Mogwon seems a bit inquisitive about your request as Hildeth often asks for building materials in bulk, but hands you the necessary crafting materials anyway. Synthesize the remaining elements for the Ishgardian cuisine.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Mogwon.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_03Mogwon hat dir gegeben. Fertige daraus und bringe sie zu Hildeth.

※ Sollte dir das Material ausgehen, kannst du von Magaziner Mogwon Nachschub erhalten.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_04<tab>You return to Hildeth with the finished products, who then declares that samplings of the cuisine are ready to be handed out. She then asks you to deliver them to Mogwon and the hardest-working moogles you see.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_04<tab>Hildeth hat dir für <var 32 ((Item)) 03F23D7F030502 /var> <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8C50030502 /var> gegeben. Verteile die Mahlzeit unter den Mogrys in den Wallenden Nebeln.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_05<tab>The moogles accept the meal trays with glee. However, as you hand them out, you notice Mogek with a puzzled look on his face. Return to him to ask what is wrong.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_05<tab>Die Mogrys haben sich sehr über die außer<var 16 /var>ge<var 16 /var>wöhn<var 16 /var>liche Mahlzeit gefreut. Kehre zu Mogek auf dem Bahrr Lehs zurück und berichte ihm von der großzügigen Aktion der Ritter.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_06<tab>Mogek is shocked that he did not receive a bowl of stew from you, and turns away to sulk, saying it had always been his dream to try Ishgardian cuisine. Hopefully he will receive one the next time that Hildeth doles out the stew.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_06<tab>Mogek ist hocherfreut über die noble Geste, doch er hätte zu gerne selber einmal die Ishgarder Küche gekostet.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_09<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_10<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_11<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_12<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_13<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_14<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_15<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_16<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_17<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_18<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_19<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_20<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_21<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_22<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hildeth.
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the Ishgardian cuisine miscellany materials from Mogwon.
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize the Ishgardian cuisine miscellany)) ((Deliver the Ishgardian cuisine miscellany to Hildeth)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Spezialrezepte: <var 2B ((<var 32 ((Item)) 06F23D7F030502 /var>)) /var> herstellen)) ((<var 2B ((<var 32 ((Item)) 06F23D7F030502 /var>)) /var> zu Hildeth bringen)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the Ishgardian cuisine to the moogles.
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_04<tab>Report to Mogek the Marvelous.
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_000<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Not too long ago Hildeth requested your assistance, which is why I was pointing you that way.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_000<tab>Gerade kam eine Ritterin namens Hildeth vorbeigeflattert, kupo. Sie hat nach dir gesucht.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_001<tab>It probably has to do with the work the sappers are doing, but I told her I would send you along if I saw you, kupo.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_001<tab>Was sie wollte, hat sie aber nicht gesagt, da musst du sie schon selber fragen. Du findest sie hier auf dem Bahrr Lehs.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_010<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day to you)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I would prefer if we kept our voices down. We sappers are arranging something for the moogles.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 08 E905 ((die Abenteurerin)) ((der Abenteurer)) /var>. Danke, dass du meinem Ruf gefolgt bist.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_011<tab>As you know, they recently have been providing us with much-needed sustenance, giving us the strength to continue to toil night and day on the restoration. We wanted to repay that kindness by giving them a taste of a traditional Ishgardian stew.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_011<tab>Die Ritter von Ishgard möchten sich bei den Mogrys für ihre tatkräftige Unterstützung bedanken. Wir dachten, wir füllen ihre runden Bäuche mit etwas Herzhaftem aus der Ishgarder Küche.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_012<tab>I thought to beseech your help, as when preparing a banquet, one always finds something missing. It takes quite a while for supplies to reach the Churning Mists from Ishgard, and we wish to serve the food to them before the ingredients spoil.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_012<tab>Wir haben zwar nur das Nötigste und für ein richtiges Festessen wird es nicht reichen, aber mit deiner Hilfe werden wir sicher einen feinen Schmaus zubereiten können.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_013<tab>Upon checking the supplies, we realized utensils from Ishgard are somewhat unwieldly for moogle paws. Perhaps you could use your skills to craft smaller spoons?
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_013<tab>Was fehlt, sind passende Löffel. Sie müssen gut in den kleinen Mogry-Händen liegen und groß genug sein, um ihre gierigen Mägen zu füllen.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_014<tab>Upon checking the supplies, we had forgotten to include essential accessories. Perhaps you could use your skills to make trays and serviettes?
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_014<tab>Was fehlt, sind passende Löffel. Sie müssen gut in den kleinen Mogry-Händen liegen und groß genug sein, um ihre gierigen Mägen zu füllen.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_015<tab>Upon checking the supplies, we realized we are unsure what moogles would actually drink as an accompaniment to the meal. Perhaps you could use your skills to make something they would enjoy?
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_015<tab>Was fehlt, ist etwas zu trinken. Etwas, das gut zu dem deftigen Ishgarder Aroma passt.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_016<tab>I hear you are acquainted with Mogwon in Asah. If you mention my name to him, I am sure he would hand over materials for you to use.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_016<tab>Mogwon hat die nötigen Zutaten, aber wir wollen natürlich nicht, dass er von unserem Geschenk erfährt. Es soll doch eine Überraschung für die Mogrys werden!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_017<tab>Although I would still be discreet. Obviously, it is a surprise, and Mogwon tends to be inquisitive.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_017<tab>Verrat ihm also bitte nichts von unserem Plan, wenn du die Sachen von ihm holst. Irgendetwas fällt dir doch bestimmt ein, oder? Hab vielen Dank!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_018<tab>I wonder, do moogles even eat meat? I've only ever seen them partake in kupo nuts, vegetables, and wine. Perhaps I should ask the cook to leave it out of the recipe in case it makes them sick. Hmm...
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_018<tab>Verrate Mogwon bitte nichts von unserem Plan, wenn du die Zutaten für das Geschenk von ihm holst. Es soll doch eine Überraschung für die Mogrys werden! Irgendetwas fällt dir doch bestimmt ein, oder? Hab vielen Dank!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_WORKINGMOOGLE02316_000_019<tab>One, two! One, two! No rest for the Mogmenders, kupo! Those nails aren't going to hammer themselves!
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_020<tab>You need more materials, kupo?
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_021<tab>Phew... Gathering crystals really saps your strength, kupo. My arms are so sore.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_021<tab>Puuuh, ich kann nicht mehr. Ich bin total kupott.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_030<tab>Huh? Are you sure Hildeth doesn't need something a little stronger and heavier for building materials? She often asks me for resources in bulk.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_030<tab>Dein Chocobo-Mitstreiter hat waaas? Das klingt ja fürchterlich! Warte, ich hol die Sachen.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_031<tab>Hmmm... Well, if it's for the Temple Knights, I suppose there's no need to question it. Here you are, kupo!
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_031<tab>Hier. Wenn du mehr brauchst, musst du es nur sagen. Aber komm mir nicht zu nahe.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_032<tab>You should take those to Hildeth right away. She gets a scary look on her face when her orders are delayed, kupo!
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_032<tab>Du brauchst noch mehr? Kein Problem, nimm, so viel du brauchst. Hauptsache, dein Chocobo hustet mich nicht an. Kupooo!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_033<tab>My apologies, kupo. It's just my responsibility to make certain the materials are being used in ways that benefit the projects.
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_040<tab>I take it you were able to prepare the finishing touches?
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_041<tab>Excellent. And with that, the meals are complete and ready to be handed out.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_041<tab>Ausgezeichnet. Dann will ich das Festmahl mal zubereiten.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_042<tab>Deliver these to the hardest-working moogles you can find. Oh, and Mogwon as well. And let me know if they enjoy it.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_042<tab>Voilà. Fertig ist der Schmaus. Das wird eine feine Überraschung für unsere Mogry-Freunde. Hättest du die Güte, uns dabei zu helfen, <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8C50030502 /var> an sie zu verteilen?

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_043<tab>I know it seems like so few bowls for how many moogles are working, but we want to be sure that it suits their tastes first. There's no use in ordering enough ingredients to feed all if it will only be wasted.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_043<tab>Bitte hilf uns, <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8C50030502 /var> an unsere Mogry-Freunde zu verteilen. Sie werden sich sicher freuen.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_WORKINGMOOGLE02316_000_050<tab>What are you just standing there for? We've got a job to do, kupo!
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_WORKINGMOOGLE02316_000_050<tab>Hauuu ruck! Hm, was stehst du da herum, kupo?

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_WORKINGMOOGLE02316_000_051<tab>Wow, this is unexpected! I suppose a small lunch break wouldn't hurt so long as we pick up the pace afterwards. Thank you very much, kupo!
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_WORKINGMOOGLE02316_000_051<tab>Das ist von den Rittern? Das ist aber nett, kupo! Da fällt einem die Arbeit ja gleich viel leichter!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_052<tab>Oh, you're back. Does Hildeth require more resources?
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_052<tab>Und? Geht es deinem Chocobo wieder besser?

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_053<tab>Aha! I knew she was planning something, kupo! This looks positively toothsome!
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_053<tab>Das ist für miiich? Das ist aber eine nette Überraschung! Vielen Dank, <var 08 E905 ((Abenteurerin)) ((Abenteurer)) /var>!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_054<tab><pant> Where is the moogle to relieve me from duty? I really could use...<pant>...a break.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_054<tab>Wenn ich nicht bald was zu mampfen bekomme, verdaue ich mich selbst ...

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_055<tab>Hildeth had you bring this food all the way over here for me? Wow, I feel so honored, kupo! Thank you, adventurer!
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_055<tab>Hui, das riecht aber lecker! Mit besten Grüßen von den Rittern? Daaanke, kupo!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_WORKINGMOOGLE02316_000_056<tab>It even has a little spoon just for me, kupo! No need to dig in with my bare paws. Although I am somewhat tempted.
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGWON_000_057<tab>Mmm, I can't wait to try it, kupo! This makes up for all of the headaches my team has been giving me lately.
TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_058<tab>After a couple bites of that stew, I feel like I could bring in an entire cartload of crystals, kupo!
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_GATHERINGMOOGLE02316_000_058<tab><mampf> <mampf> Die Ritter wissen, wie man kocht.

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_059<tab>It appears the moogles are enjoying our culinary creation, so we hope to make this a regular occurrence. We will make more when the next shipment comes in, so be assured that every Mogmender will eventually be able to try a taste.
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_HILDEATH_000_059<tab>Den Mogrys scheint es zu schmecken. Und sie arbeiten sogar noch fleißiger als vorher. Sie sind wirklich ein tüchtiges Völkchen. Ich freue mich, dass die Aktion ein Erfolg war. Danke dir, <var 08 E905 ((Abenteurerin)) ((Abenteurer)) /var>!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_070<tab>What is going on? I just saw a moogle fly by with a delicious-looking sauce dribbled all over his coat.

TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_071<tab>Hildeth is having trays of food handed out to some of the Mogmenders? But, but, what about <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo? I didn't receive one! Are there any left?
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_071<tab>Ach, die Ritter haben den Mogrys etwas gekocht? Das ist aber wirklich freundlich von ihnen. Was für eine gelungene Überraschung! Kupo!

source: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_072<tab><sigh> Oh, it's fine. It's not like I <var 1A 02 /var>told<var 1A 01 /var> you I wanted any. People forget, I suppose. It was just, you know, a little dream of mine to dine on proper Ishgardian cuisine, but oh well... <sniffle>
target: TEXT_BANMOG604_02316_MOGEK_000_072<tab>Aber warum habe ich denn nichts bekommen? Ich hätte so gerne mal eine richtige Ishgarder Speise gekostet ... Kupooo!
